Text: Something is wrong with this index. I tried to perform a minor edit to the description, and TPB would not save it. Not only that, but it reset the type to other/other and deleted my tags. WTF.
Thanks for unearthing all this great obscure film noir. My favorite genre!

I like sharing the old films also, I'm using the program "Handbrake" to rip my DVD collection to H264, .mp4 . It seems to work ok, still experimenting to re-encode some of my DVDs. The "television" setting in the program is useful on some of the lower quality disks. Thanks for the film.
